Title: Impostor
Writer: Philip K. Dick (short story "The Impostor"), Scott Rosenberg (adaptation), Caroline Case (screenplay), Ehren Kruger (screenplay), David Twohy (screenplay)
Actors: Gary Sinise, Madeleine Stowe, Vincent D'Onofrio, Tony Shalhoub
Plot: In the future, an alien race uses androids as bombs to attack Earth. A government weapons specialist is accused of being one such android and sets out to prove his innocence.
